channel.title: Check out my projects! on Introduction
channel.description: Recent content in Check out my projects! on Introduction

item.title: DustCopter
item.description: In early 2021 I decided to see if I could program a drone to dust off my TV. I couldn’t… it crashes any time an errant breeze blows its way. But I learned a lot about drones and re-ignited my latent passion for robotics
